description:
Job Title: Part-Time Sales Recruiter
$30/HR
You must have expeirence as a sales recruiter with B2B sales roles, SDR to VP of Sales
If there's a fit, you could start tomorrow. This is a part time, 1099 role.
We're seeking an experienced part-time Sales Recruiter to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in B2B sales roles and excellent judgment in evaluating talent.
Key Responsibilities:
  • Conduct candidate interviews as scheduled
  • Accurately document candidate responses to predetermined questions
  • Assess candidates' suitability for roles based on their responses and overall fit
  • Potentially source candidates (not required initially)
Requirements:
  • Experience in B2B sales roles -
  • Strong interviewing and assessment skills
  • Excellent written communication for documenting responses
  • Ability to make sound judgments on candidate suitability
  • Flexible availability - we match your calendar

Hours: 5-20+ hours per week, varying based on workload. No minimum guaranteed hours.
This role offers the opportunity to work with a variety of candidates and contribute to matching top talent with our clients' needs.
